A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was surprisingly easy to follow in spite of what I'd heard about Star Wars. There are these good guys in small spaceships being chased by bad guys in big spaceships. The good guys have to sneak in to one of the big ships to turn off some sort of tracker. This girl warrior learns how to do magic tricks from a grumpy old wizard who vanishes at the end after tricking the main bad guy. The good guys escape and share some rotisserie chicken.
